Blog.post: well...back agn..im actualli kinda jus riting to myself realli cus no one actualli sees this...i guess itts pretty much kinda stupid... but im glad no one dus cus it can b pretty embarassin. ...Hmm... todae, we had our art club tea party for the sec 4 farewell party. in fact, i jus reach home. phew..real tiring. i was in charge of one of the stations.its pretty fun. but tiring 2. cookieZ was there too preparing for the campfire tomorow nite. im kinda startin to haf the feelin he dun realli like mi animore... well.. i dunno about it..and its not like i care, do i?? DARn! i thnk i kinda like him...and im unconvinced. i keep tellin miself i dun but ...i jus get mor confused. oh well...i h8 this feelin. i realli wish i can remain as frens wif him till aft o level.... i realise i grow uglier dae by dae.i mean it.i get bad hair days everydae, and i saw the art club foto todae and witnessed how horrible and weird i haf grown to b. well...i realli dun wanna think abt it. aniwae...mani things have been hapening thruout the week. i noe of sumone hu likes cookieZ. its actualli sumone i dun realii like ...ok not H8 but i jus can barely tok to her up to 2 sentences? unsocialable or detest, u cal it? i dun h8 her for likin cookieZ. in fact i herd she likes him 4 a pretty long time. while for mi, i dun realli like like him,until recentli? thats y i was sorta saying she desrves hm mor than mi cus at least she can return him, the basic love ..while i probably wun b able to do it as much...sad huh? tts about all this wk...oh one mor thing... vincent, burger went arnd tellin ppl im his gf..i duno if its tru but im gona get to the botom of it.i hope its jus a rumor.cus wen he saed he likes mi, i took it as a joke and well even so i noe he's jokin and i wun take it seriusly.but wen he starts to sae the rong thing. im gonna b pretty freaked out..well lets c abt tt.i hope its realli jus a joke.

todae i stayed back in school for the debate finals tmr...can u blif it...its tomorow.luckily im oni the reserve..todae is very tiring.slept at 12 midnite las nite..cud barely make it during social studies lesson..i hope we'll win tmr...im be so elated.recentli, my fren has a new crush,she saes this time it was different. like very special she saes...but frankly...i think its gonna b the same cus i noe how it feels b4 and wen it did not work out...u'll be worst than ever...tts y now i think being frens is beter than BGR..so at least can share everything under the sun and moon and dun hafta b awkward and all...but is BGR, break up le than still hafta try to avoid one another ...why bother..she is gg to confess soon...so i sun probably tell her tt rite?? so i'll jus wish jer luck.n i'll b there 4 her wen it dus not work out.well..wad mor can i do...besides now..she rather tok to HIM than tokin to me and leaves mi out in conversation.im not jealous or anithing.jus...hei..i still need a little respect here..i'm still ur fren afterall...
